source.name: Common Core of Data : Local Education Agency (School District) Finance Survey Data
source.description: This survey collects data on revenues and expenditures for each public, elementary and secondary education school district in the United States.  Data are collected from state education agencies who collect it from the school districts and other local education agencies in the state.
